dockPositionDesc: Set the default dock position of the TOC.
followFocusDesc: If enabled, TOC only shows headings within the focus area when in Focus Mode. Otherwise, it shows full TOC and highlights the focus area.
adaptiveHeightDesc: If enabled, the TOC container height adjusts to its content instead of filling the available height.
miniTocWidthDesc: Width of the TOC strip when collapsed (px)
toolbarActionsDesc: Select actions to display in the floating toolbar.
customCssDesc:
Enter custom CSS here to override default styles.
E.g.: .siyuan-floating-toc-plugin-container .toc-panel { background: red !important; }
customCssPlaceholder: Please enter here, your input will be automatically saved
fullscreenSettingsDesc: Enable or disable fullscreen viewing for various chart types
enableFullscreenHelperDesc: Master switch: Enable or disable the fullscreen helper feature
enableDoubleClickDesc: Double-click the chart area to quickly enter fullscreen mode
